content.rendered: The learning objectives of this chapter are the following: The reader will understand the strengths and limitations of various types of artificial neural networks. Several representative neural network algorithms will be presented and discussed in detail. Practical applications of neural networks will be explored by the reader through a set of exercises at the end of the chapter.
